meanings.definition: A sandwich made with Italian bread, typically filled with meat, cheese, and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious panino for lunch.
meanings.sent2: She ordered a panino with ham and cheese at the cafe.
meanings.sent3: The panino was so big, it looked like a tower of flavors!
meanings.sent4: His creativity was like a panino, combining different elements into a satisfying whole.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the panino filled the room, making everyone hungry.
